verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: took] [ARG1: some heat] [ARGM-LOC: on social media] [ARGM-CAU: for his planting of a tree at the White House , gifted to him by French President Emmanuel Macron] .
President Trump took some heat on social media for his planting of [ARG1: a tree at the White House] , [V: gifted] [ARG2: to him] [ARG0: by French President Emmanuel Macron] .
